data.eml:eml: Sireuma, a new genus of subterranean millipedes from the Iberian Peninsula (Diplopoda, Chordeumatida, Opisthocheiridae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Reboleira, Ana Sofia P. S., Enghoff, Henrik (2014): Sireuma, a new genus of subterranean millipedes from the Iberian Peninsula (Diplopoda, Chordeumatida, Opisthocheiridae). Zootaxa 3785 (1): 79-86, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3785.1.6
